member.name: M:Alzaitu.Lacewing.Client.Packet.Packet.GetSize
member.summary: Retrive the size of the packet, in bytes.
member.returns: A number between 0 and 4294967295 describing the length of the packet in bytes.

members.member: Example UDP Binary message: {Type: xx, Sub: xx, Channel id: x, x, User ID: x, x, Message...}

member.name: P:Alzaitu.Lacewing.Client.Packet.PacketTypeAttribute.CanRead
member.summary: If true, this packet can be read.
